title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama’s local models for chains, agents, retrieval and tool-calling workflows.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat folders, multi-model convos, code highlighting, RAG, admin panel, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Unofficial Go CLI that adds model conversion, bulk pull, and YAML config templates on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Official VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion and chat sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with one-line run commands and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for using Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Turn-key RAG template using Ollama, Chroma, LangChain and Streamlit—ingest PDFs and chat locally in 5 min.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for Ollama with model manager, chat history, and system prompt templates.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot plugin that lets players chat with local LLMs inside Minecraft via Ollama—great for educational servers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot bringing local LLM chat, image-captioning and slash-commands powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible, declarative local LLM deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, SSE streaming, and ergonomic generate/chat builders.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models pre-configured for Ollama with Modelfile snippets and benchmarks.
